item.description:
Friday, June 5th is coming - time for another game night!

We'll be playing board games at our favorite coffee house, Empire Tea and Coffee on Broadway.

What will we be playing? I've got no idea. Last week it was Upwards (a 3d version of Scrabble), the week before it was Race for the Galaxy.

Have any questions? Send me a message. Have a game you think we'd like? Bring it along!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guys in the back. Also, try my cell: (401) 699-7304
item.name: Board Games @ Empire
